text: The 1950 Volta a Catalunya was the 30th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 17 September to 24 September 1950. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Antonio Gelabert. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 29" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 46" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 40" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 42" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 12' 02" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 12' 09" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 17' 13" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 19' 26" |} |} ==References== 1950 Volta Category:1950 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1950 sports events
